mainHeader.title: We need your help!
mainHeader.desc: To guarantee the success of this congress, the Congress Organizing Committee are requesting everyone to support this initiative financially or through material support. Through your donation, you will help give Filipino Esperanto speakers and learners the opportunity to experience a truly multicultural atmosphere, consolidate the Esperanto movement in the Philippines, and ensure the continuous growth of the local community.

congressFund.title: The Congress Fund
congressFund.desc:
This fund will be used to finance the organization of the congress, including costs, materials, payments for artists, and others. For your reference, the Organizing Committee has a budget proposal document that you can request by contacting us.

Finally, your contributions will:

  • promote and realize a high quality congress
  • keep the registration fee low enough for local participants

participantFund.title: Participant Support
participantFund.desc:
The Philippines is a developing nation, which means that not everyone is economically well-off to participate in conferences, among others. Because of its archipelagic nature, the usual way to travel around the country is via airplane or ship, which the youth usually cannot afford. Students usually do not have income and cannot shell out a lot from their funds to finance their daily events. Because of these, there is always a risk of losing potential participants, which we would like to prevent.

To make the FJK truly inclusive, we would like to successfully invite Esperantists from other regions. Therefore, we are introducing this fund to partly help the youth who would like to participate in the FJK.

fejFund.title: Organization Fund
fejFund.desc:
Aside from organizing the FJK, The Philippine Esperanto Youth (FEJ) also intiates activities that will promote and strengthen the Esperanto movement in the country. It organizes monthly meetings and free language lessons, publishes brochures and other printed materials, etc. Being a non-profit youth organization, it does not have a lot of funds aside from deriving it from the membership fee and other contributions and donations internally and externally.

Through this fund, you will help continue its existence and its goals that it has before, during, and after the FJK.

payPal.title: PayPal
payPal.desc: You can donate directly to the congress funds via PayPal using your credit card.

goGetFunding.title: GoGetFunding
goGetFunding.desc: You can also donate through GoGetFunding to see some progress regarding the congress funds.

uea.title: UEA Account
uea.desc: If you are a member of UEA, or prefer to donate through the Central Office, you can donate using the code phej-d.

others.title: Others
others.desc: You can also send brochures and pamphlets that can be handed out to congress participants.
